en.label: This Change Log added
en.description: A new change log feature has been added to keep track of updates and changes in the application.

en.label: Added to see updates REMOVE LATER
New exam-retrieval API
en.description: Speeding up initial exam downloads with improved API architecture.

en.label: Send to grading tools - Analog
en.description: Send to Canvas grading tools for Analog exams should now work correctly.

en.label: Bonus Points PDF points text position
en.description: Fixed position of points text output to allowing for better visibility when using tablets.

en.label: Temp file cleanup
en.description: Improved cleanup of temporary files to prevent storage issues. Aswell as a task run 04:00 every day as fallback.

en.label: QuestionNumber support in PDF
en.description: Added support for questionNumber on the PDF to improve bonus points tracking.

en.label: BonusPoints-pdf points placement
en.description: Moved BonusPoints-pdf points placement on PDF output for better visibility.

en.label: Assignments in AssignmentsGroups
en.description: Assignments are now placed and sorted in Canvas - AssignmentGroups

en.label: Add Möbius Grading video guide
en.description: A new video guide has been added to help users understand how to use Möbius Grading effectively.

en.label: Fix PDF generation for bonus points
en.description: Resolved an issue where bonus points were not being correctly displayed in the PDF output.

en.label: Added PDF-template-sheets
en.description: Introduced a new PDF template-sheet based on Chalmers' template for better exam formatting.

en.label: Improve colors for guides
en.description: Enhanced the visibility of guides by improving color contrast and clarity.
